messages.subject: Re:upside down peach cake
messages.msgSnippet: ... get to this recipe, too! I have a couple a three days of posts.... ... Thanks Sharon... My dd and I spent her last Tuesday before she left for Basic
messages.messageBody:
> From: Sharon Rudd <bearspawprint@...>
> Awwwww Jeanmarie...that is so sweet! Now I have to keep on reading 'till I
get to this recipe, too! I have a couple'a'three days of posts....
>
> Sorry about your Mom, and DS not getting to meet her in person.

Thanks Sharon... My dd and I spent her last Tuesday before she left for Basic
Training going through OLD family pictures and putting them in a scrapbook. It
was the neatest thing I think we've ever done before. She got a chance to
"see" her grandparents and great-grands on both sides. Talk about a bonding
moment!

Now we have a scrapbook that all the kids can enjoy and get to "know" the
family bit by bit.

Find that recipe - it looks absolutely delicious!!!

Jeanmarie

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:upside down peach cake
messages.msgSnippet: I got the recipe from my mom.  It was very simple.  After I eat it tonight I ll let you know how it was :).  Happy cooking  ~Rue ... From: Jeanmarie Shingleton
messages.messageBody:
I got the recipe from my mom. It was very simple. After I eat it tonight
I'll let you know how it was :). Happy cooking ~Rue

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeanmarie Shingleton [mailto:Jmarieqlts@...]
Sent: Friday, September 07, 2001 5:38 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:upside down peach cake


Thank you!! whoever posted this recipe I don't know how to say thank you
enough. My mom passed away 21 years ago and ever since then I've been
searching for a good recipe for one of these. She used to make the most
delicious upside-down cakes.... Yummmmmmm

Anyway... I think I've got a project for this weekend. DS has been begging
me
to make a cake from scratch with him... this is it!

Thanks again - bunches and bunches!!

Jeanmarie - who's going to have one very happy 14yo boy this weekend!
